0.name: Escape Artist
0.description: You're faster at opening the Escape door

2.name: Panic!
2.description: At night, move faster in human form when the power has been completed

3.name: Skedaddle
3.description: Gain a burst of movement speed after expelling a Terror

5.name: Surveillance
5.description: If you revive someone you can see their position for 15 seconds

7.name: Speedy Recovery
7.description: Health packs instant heal a chunk before healing more over time

8.name: Field Medic
8.description: Gain a movement speed buff if you're able to antidote someone

9.name: Statically Charged
9.description: Gain a movement speed buff for a short period after finishing a generator

12.name: Blas√©
12.description: Reduce the time added per extra vote cast by 1 second

13.name: Free Refill
13.description: Gain a clip of ammo whenever you start a Shoot Objective

14.name: Slasher
14.description: Increased melee damage with the knife

16.name: Critical Thinking
16.description: Deal 25% extra damage when hitting targets in the head with the Pistol

17.name: Bandolier
17.description: Increase the maximum Pistol ammo you can carry by a clip

18.name: Untrack
18.description: If someone that's tracking you is downed it will break the connection

19.name: Scavenger
19.description: Pick up an extra couple of bullets from each Ammo spawn

23.name: Interrogate
23.description: If you cast the eliminating vote on a downed player you will be told if they were Infected

24.name: Hyperaware
24.description: Any Infected transforming into Terror Form near you will be highlighted

25.name: Stake Out
25.description: The Infected's Terror Sense won't reveal you if you're crouched & not moving
